entries.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 14.8°C
entries.summary: Observed at: Saint John Airport 3:00 PM ADT Saturday 01 July 2017 | Condition: Light Drizzle | Temperature: 14.8°C | Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa steady | Visibility: 3.2 km | Humidity: 100 % | Dewpoint: 14.8°C | Wind: E 16 km/h | Air Quality Health Index: 1
entries.observedAt: Saint John Airport 3:00 PM ADT Saturday 01 July 2017

entries.title: Saturday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 16. POP 60%
entries.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches along the coast. Wind south 20 km/h. High 16. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 01 July 2017

entries.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low 13. POP 60%
entries.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Risk of a thundershower overnight. Fog spreading inland this evening. Amount 10 mm in the heaviest showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 01 July 2017

entries.title: Sunday: Showers. High 18 except 24 inland.
entries.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of a thundershower in the morning. Fog retreating to the coast in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 18 except 24 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 01 July 2017
